Title: KPC seeks up to five October 2021- January 2022 LNG cargoes
Description: Kuwaitâ€™s state-owned KPC has issued a tender to buy up to five LNG cargoes for delivery across Oct. 23 to Jan. 31 to its 11 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Al- Zour LNG import terminal. The tender closes on Aug. 23 with offers expected to remain valid until two days later
